#summary Setting up the test framework for development

= How to get !EasyMock configured for running !GeoBeagle unit tests =

You can also download the files from the !GeoBeagle download tab.

  # Download !EasyMock and !EasyMock Class Extension from: http://www.easymock.org/Downloads.html
  # Download the CGLib Byte Code Generataton Library from http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=56933
  # Select your test project, right-click and select "Properties".
  # Select "Java Build Path"
  # Click on the Libraries tab
   # Click "Add External Jars", and add an entry for each of cglib-nodep-2.1_3.jar, easymock.jar, easymockclassextension.jar
